name: StopPoint_Get
description: Gets a list of StopPoints corresponding to the given list of stop ids.

ids.description:
A comma-separated list of stop point ids (station naptan code e.g. 940GZZLUASL). Max. approx. 20 ids.
            You can use /StopPoint/Search/{query} endpoint to find a stop point id from a station name.

includeCrowdingData.description: Include the crowding data (static). To Filter further use: /StopPoint/{ids}/Crowding/{line}

$ul: **additionalProperties**: A bag of additional key/value pairs with extra information about this place.
**distance**: The distance of the place from its search point, if this is the result
**indicator**: The indicator of the stop point e.g. "Stop K"
**placeType**: The type of Place. See /Place/Meta/placeTypes for possible values.
**stopLetter**: The stop letter, if it could be cleansed from the Indicator e.g. "K"
**url**: The unique location of this resource.
